divs: sighting detailsi noticed a light over the apartment building down the street from me. it was the size of a star but it appeared low enough that we could see planes and a helicopter flying higher and by it. we watched it for 15-20 mins. we looked w\ both binoculars and a telescope and could only make out a single light source. i did get video of it but because it was so cold that night, i only stayed out a few seconds at a time. because it was dark it is hard to see the light in the video but i tried to keep it in the middle of the picture above the building. it seemed to pulse or flicker a little. hopefully, you will be able to see it better if you can adjust the exposure? it never moved and then we noticed it started to descend in a straight line down. it happened over a period of another 10 mins. or so and the just disappeared below the horizon.
